Guy4/pause 3000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/message \"That was fun! Time to go home...\"/waitForOtherPlayers festivalEnd/end #!String
Abigail: I really hate dancing in front of everyone... It's so embarrassing.#$e#Mom makes me do it.$u #!String
Robin: Ahh... The air smells so sweet with all these flowers.$h #!String
Demetrius: These springtime dances can be traced back to ancient fertility rituals.#$e#Hey... You should know about this stuff, farmer. #!String
Maru: I like dancing, but this one is a little stilted. The old timers really love it, though. #!String
Sebastian: Ugh... #!String
Linus: Oh, hello there. It's nice of you to talk to me.#$b#Spring is almost over... what a shame. #!String
Pierre: What! How'd you get back here?$u#$b#Don't touch anything. #!String
Caroline: I wish Pierre would spend this time with the family...$s #!String
Alex: I'm just enjoying the scenery... hehe. #!String
George: Flowers? I can hardly see them.#$e#It's too bright out here! #!String
Evelyn: I've been working on these floral arrangements for a week. Do you like them? #!String
Lewis: If you'd like to dance with the other young people, you'll need to find a partner. #!String
Clint: I wonder if Emily would dance with me? #!String
Penny: *gulp*... I'm nervous.$s #!String
Pam: Now this is the life... Huh, kid? Sweet wine, a babbling brook, warm air... Did I mention wine? #!String
Emily: Whoo... I'm stuffed. Hey, have you tried the red jelly yet? #!String
Haley: I'm practicing my dance moves... It needs to be perfect.#$e#I've been flower queen for the past 5 years and I'm not ready to step off the throne just yet! #!String
Jodi: Are you going to be dancing today, @?$h #!String
Kent: This open field... it makes me nervous.#$e#*whisper* Happy thoughts, Kent. Happy Thoughts. #!String
Marlon: Marnie looks lovely today... #!String
Sam: You know what? I admit it... I really like flowers! #!String
Leah: Hi @. Glad to see you here.$h #!String
Shane: Mmm... excellent sauce. *slurp*#$e#Ah, this green stuff is spicy! *munch*#$b#*crunch* ...ow.$s #!String
Marnie: *sigh*... Love is in the air... And I'm still single.$s #!String
Elliott: I wore my best shirt for the dance... This sort of thing doesn't happen very often! #!String
Gus: Frog season is really starting to pick up. #!String
Dwarf: You say it's raining up above? *gasp*#$e#Rain... It's almost mythical to us. Some of us live our entire lives without ever experiencing it. #!String
Wizard: You shouldn't be up here. #!String
Harvey: I'm working up the courage to ask someone to dance with me.$11 #!String
Sandy: I heard it's raining back home. Is that why you came here?$h#$e#I kind of miss the rain, actually...$s #!String
Jas: Some day, I'm going to be the flower queen! #!String
Vincent: That's not fair... Why can't I be the flower queen? #!String
Willy: I should've brought my fishing pole. #!String
Leo: The flowers here are nice, but they aren't as colorful as back home!$h#$e#I wonder if I'll ever have to get up there and dance...$u #!String
